name: ANTI_PIRATE
description:
ANTI_PIRATE is (will be) a top-down shoot-em-up roguelike set in space. To progress, you need to make a living selling scrap from enemies and using some of it to upgrade your ship. It is currently in a HEAVY indev, and I would appreciate it if you would take some time to play it and fill out the feedback form.

Known bugs:

1. When you run out of fuel, the game just completely bugs out.
